film.title: Fight Club
film.actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
film.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

film.title: The Godfather
film.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
film.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

film.title: Schindler's List
film.actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
film.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

film.title: Pulp Fiction
film.actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
film.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

film.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
film.actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
film.description: Archaeology professor Indiana Jones ventures to seize a biblical artefact known as the Ark of the Covenant. While doing so, he puts up a fight against Renee and a troop of Nazis.

film.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
film.actors: Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan
film.description: A skirmish in Shanghai puts archaeologist Indiana Jones, his partner Short Round and singer Willie Scott crossing paths with an Indian village desperate to reclaim a rock stolen by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

film.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
film.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
film.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

film.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
film.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
film.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

film.title: The Terminator
film.actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
film.description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
